experience: You and Robert both know Josh Stomel, Robert Ardell, and 5 others

Independent Contractor working with various agencies and direct-contract clients from all over the United States on a remote basis, to utilize my expertise in Magento in all aspects. Including but not limited to: Magento Consultation, Migrations to Magento from other various platforms, Maintenance/customization to existing Magento Community & Enterprise implementations, Custom module planning and development, Leading various development teams with team-members located all over the continental United States consisting of teams of 5 or more as Team Lead / Senior Developer  - involved in quoting projects, planning/architecture, resource management and allocation, project management/quality control, training, and also thoroughly involved in day-to-day development with my own backend-dev workload (theming, custom functionality/extension development, third-party integrations, etc.)
Interactive Designer & Frontend Developer, iFuel Interactive, LLC.

Senior Web Developer for full-service interactive agency specializing in Magento development. Lead the development and deployment of custom built enterprise scale e-commerce applications. Involved in all phases: Discovery, design, development, testing and deployment. Head of the interactive design team responsible for overseeing, building, testing, and implementing complex interfaces heavily relying on JavaScript and AJAX. Educated in device-neutral design incorporating responsive techniques employing the use of CSS3 and JavaScript.Primary Focuses: Magento E-commerce, Magento Development, Custom Application Development, Strategic Web Design, Responsive Design, UX/UI, Email Marketing & Design, Intranet & Extranet Solutions, LAMP Hosting and Infrastructure Administration
Self-employed freelance Web Developer contracted by various companies of all sizes to build and/or maintain custom WordPress websites, extensions, themes, etc.

Technology/Engineering Account Manager & Recruiter at Kforce
January 27, 2017, Robert was a client of Jessica’s

If you're in the market for a new tech job, I would personally recommend Jessica a hundred times over. Jessica went above and beyond to help me take the next best step in my career. I have been an independent e-commerce engineer for several years now. It's been great working independently, I've had the opportunity to work with countless e-commerce retailers of all shapes and sizes, in all sorts of different positions with very little to complain about. But, the only thing I missed was working with a team of other talented engineers on a daily basis. I've worked for a few agencies in the past, and was considering the possibility of joining back with a team and working for an agency again with some hesitance after some not-so-great experiences. After spending time going over my background, Jessica went above and beyond to promote me for the best opportunities out there. Whether it involved late night phone calls, countless emails, Jessica was there to help every step of the way. I ended up accepting a position last year with the agency I now work for, Crimson Agility, and I honestly couldn't be happier! The best part is, Jessica still calls me every now and then to make sure I'm happy with the new position and to make sure everything in my transition back to an agency setting is going smoothly. I've worked with SO MANY recruiters in the past, as it's pretty common in my field, and no one else has stood out like Jessica has. All I can say is - it's been such a pleasure getting to work with you and thank you, thank you, thank you!

summary: - Magento Certified Developer, 10+ Years Professional Experience- Diverse in both Design and Programming (Frontend & Backend)- Favorite Tools: Magento, PHP, jQuery, PhotoshopI develop custom e-commerce solutions utilizing the Magento e-commerce platform. I earned my certification as a MAGENTO CERTIFIED DEVELOPER in July of 2012. I've been developing with Magento for 5+ Years (both Community and Enterprise editions). I am competent and capable of engaging in any type of custom web development project. My 10+ years of professional industry experience, having developed hundreds of websites for companies of all sizes, will allow me to manage and execute your project flawlessly from start to finish. I am well-versed in the following web technologies and frameworks: xHTML / CSS, Native Javascript, jQuery, jQuery UI, Prototype, https://www.linkedin.com/redir/invalid-link-page?url=Script%2eaculo%2eus, Object-Orientated Programming / MVC Architecture - PHP / MySQL (LAMP Development),  Windows, Ubuntu / Linux Server Administration, Maintenance & Setup, Magento and WordPress.I have a love for both design and programming. I have the capability of designing you a beautiful website in addition to programming it to function better than you could ever imagine. My experience and knowledge of UX (User Experience) empowers me to know how your customer would want your website to work, and my knowledge of programming and creative design allows me to deliver you a complete package; a website that is intuitive, beautiful and stable.
name: Robert Nicklin
title: 6+ Yrs Certified Senior Magento Developer / Ecommerce Specialist
